articles.title: Humane's AI Pin seems to be forgetting what makes a good wearable - The Verge
articles.description: For a wearable to be successful, it has to be something you can wear nearly all the time and in public. From what we know, Humane’s AI Pin doesn’t seem to get that.
articles.content:
Before you disrupt everything, you have to deeply consider the current cultural norms or no one will wear your wearable.
ByVictoria Song, a senior reporter focusing on wearables, health tech, and mo… [+5886 chars]
